name: reversible mini octopus
notes:
are you looking for a cute crochet amigurumi that works up fast? check out the reversible no-sew mini octopus pattern. it's an easy and fun crochet amigurumi octopus even beginners can make.


this pattern is no sew. not even a single part to attach.
even better! you don't need any stuffing for these cute octopuses. how cool, right?

**** this is not a finished toy ****
this pattern requires no sewing. 100% no sew.

this pattern includes:
* 1 pdf file
* step-by-step written instructions and photo tutorials for a mini crochet octopus.

materials:
* plush yarn, tapestry needle, safety eyes, crochet hook
* you can use any weight of yarn for this project.

difficulty: advanced beginner.

skills required: crocheting in a spiral, magic ring, chain, slip stitch, single crochet stitch, increasing and decreasing, crocheting around a chain.

if you have any questions contact us via private message!
